vlive.korean: '사실 청춘에는 내 미래를 고민하고 걱정하느냐고 잠 정도는 뭐 잃어봐야 되지 않겠어요?' "In my youth, it's only right to lose sleep to worry about my future, right?" 듣기 View video VICTON : 찬이의 라디오 로맨스..🖤-@🌙
vlive.english: "In my youth, it's only right to lose sleep to worry about my future, right?"
